name: Heroes Evolution World
description:
Lionbird’s latest masterpiece - Heroes Evolution World
When you're competing in the contest of heroes, heroes fight villains.
It seems to be endless.
Let’s fight till the end!
-Vivid description of heroes, written in first-person point of view
-An exciting mini-game to play, simple yet incredible.
-Evolve your heroes, explore their powers and abilities. Discover many different kinds of heroes.
